    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sneak Savant](/Feats.aspx?ID=579) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 187 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Knight Reclaimant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=28) (Level 12), [Verduran Shadow](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=312) (Level 12)

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

</column>

---

It is almost impossible to spot you without taking effort to look. When you roll a failure on a Sneak action, you get a success instead. You can still critically fail.
